short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that replaces specific words on webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Word Replacer

Transform your web browsing experience with Word Replacer! This intuitive Chrome extension allows you to easily replace specific words on any webpage with custom terms of your choice. Whether you want to have a bit of fun, enhance readability, or correct typos on the fly, Word Replacer gives you the power to personalize the text on the sites you visit.

Features:

• Custom Word Replacement: Define and manage a list of words and their replacements.
• Real-Time Changes: See the changes instantly as you browse the web.
• Easy Configuration: Set up replacements quickly through a user-friendly interface.
• Wide Compatibility: Works with any website to help you customize your web content.
Enhance your web experience with Word Replacer—download it now and start transforming your text!
